title: Update Failed
body:
Hello , I uninstall league of legends after the patch bug. When i reinstall it it's telling me Update failed and I don't know what to do.

Please help !

replies.body: Do me a favor and try updating again now that our devs have been able to smooth everything over. If you're still having issues, go ahead and hit up our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
